OrgName: Getty Images, Inc. and its subsidiaries
activities: This certification covers personal information that may be transferred from the EU regarding EU employees, customers, suppliers and vendors for various activities including administration of employee benefits, human resources activities, worldwide ticketing systems to monitor workflow and customer support, sales, and marketing strategy and research activities.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President and General Counsel

recoursemech:
Compliance with private sector, third party privacy-seal program with dispute resolution, Direct Marketing Association (DMA) 
Also,
